description:
This DLC includes a multiplayer mecha "Graeme" and a multiplayer pilot "Vulphaes Bonaparte".
Graeme and Vulphaes Bonaparte can only be used in Local Multiplayer, Online Multiplayer and Training.

【Mecha】
Modified Golem adjusted to the feature of the pilot, suitable for melee combat. The ride for Vulphaes Bonaparte.

Primary Weapon - Dagger Attack
Launches quick attack with AT Dagger

Secondary Weapon - Chest Vulcan
Small caliber vulcan gun.

Light Melee - Martial Arts
Performs 2 combo melee strike

Heavy Melee - Iaido Heavy Slash
Loads HE round then performs a large scale strafing.

Light Melee(Battle Damaged) - Ram
Performs a tackle.

Secondary Weapon(Battle Damaged) - Chest Vulcan
Small caliber vulcan gun.

Defend/Transform
None.

【Pilot】
Vulphaes is the ACE Pilot of Musbel, a wild red-hair merc who is very good with guns and knives.
name: Graeme & Vulphaes
